message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my budget. How about we aim for $15,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'll try to stay within my budget while still getting a good deal. How about we set the product price at $16,000?
